name: Atelier Escha & Logy Plus: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky
name_original: Atelier Escha & Logy Plus: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky
description:
An improved Escha & Logy comes to the PlayStation®Vita!
This 2nd release in the Dusk series can be downloaded at the PS Store.
With 2 main characters, a new mixing system, and a 6 character battle system, this Atelier offers an exceptional experience.
1 player(s)
2048KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Dual Analog Sticks
Motion Sensor
Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
